questions.question: 4. Which material is used to make the core of Flyback transformer

explanations.c: Explanation 3: The core of a flyback transformer is typically made of materials with high permeability and low core losses to ensure efficient energy storage and transfer. The most commonly used materials is ferrite and its alloys.
